achievements: Improved insights and decision-making for the customer success team by developing customer activity tracking and visualization solution using .NET framework and React.
Successfully repaired broken APIs and pages built with AngularJS framework, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information for customers.
Revived and enhanced an outdated AngularJS application to provide the customer success team with critical health data on customers.
Created foundations of a new Accessibility project including the setup of:
-> Front-end: set up a new React (TypeScript) project and implemented Sass-less, Jest, Lint rules and implemented navigation.
-> Dev-Ops: Set up Azure pipelines for CI/ CD and created necessary development environments with their respective branches.
-> Backend: Following best industry practices, I created an API that feeds necessary survey data for Accessibility pages.
Encouraged everyone in the team to create reusable components where possible and as a result, the development process became shorter, and the code became much cleaner.
Implemented custom React hooks for data fetching that leverage local Storage for caching, thereby minimizing redundant API calls and optimizing React performance by preventing unnecessary re-renders.
Contributed to the backend database design to ensure maximum efficiency of API usage to save on API-related costs.
Developed React-based landing pages for clients, ensuring high-quality user experience.
Optimized loading times of smaller projects by utilizing Next.js framework.
Assisted in the implementation of the Express.js framework.
Rigorously tested codebase using Jest framework to ensure robustness and reliability.
Developed and updated automation test files using Ruby while self-teaching the Ruby language
Installed and setup Ruby to work flawlessly with Selenium and Chrome Driver on MacOS
Performed both Automated and manual tests on the web application.
Utilized Postman for back-End API testing and Selenium for the automation of front-End testing.
Updated legacy JavaScript scripts to be compatible with the new user data formats.
